title: Univers & symbol
content:
Does anyone know where I can buy the Univers family with the Et style '&' symbol?   
   
Thanks
author: jonathanlawley

comments.content:
Hi Jonathan.   
   
Take a peak at this thread:   
 [http://www.typophile.com/forums/messages/30/4651.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020154953/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/30/4651.html)   
   
It seems the answer to your question is overly complicated and easily side-tracked. There is a somewhat sinister entry at the end of the thread that make this et version sound like some illegal narcotic.   
   
Hope that helps.   
Randy
